sentences.en: " Wouldst thou avenge thyself on the innocent babe? "
sentences.cn: “ 你打算在这无辜的婴儿身上发泄你的仇恨 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: " Wouldst thou avenge thyself on the innocent babe? " whispered she. "
sentences.cn: " 你打算在这无辜的婴儿身上发泄你的仇恨 吗 ? " 她悄声说.

sentences.en: Hamlet planned to avenge his father upon the murderer.
sentences.cn: 哈姆雷特打算惩处凶手以报父仇.

sentences.en: Hamlet planned to avenge his father.
sentences.cn: 哈姆雷特计谋为父报仇.

sentences.en: He is propelled by both guilt and the need to avenge his father.
sentences.cn: 他受到内疚感和为父报仇之心的双重驱使。

sentences.en: He promised to avenge his father's murder.
He swore to avenge himself on his enemy for the insult given to his name.
sentences.cn: 他的敌人侮辱他的名声,他发誓要报复.

sentences.en: He vowed to avenge the insult.
sentences.cn: 他发誓要报复那次侮辱.

sentences.en: He wanted to avenge his brother’s death.
He will avenge the people on their oppressor.
sentences.cn: 他将为(受压迫的)人民向压迫者报仇.

sentences.en: Now, after twenty years, the chance to avenge ourselves on Uruguay had finally come.
sentences.cn: 现在, 二十年后, 向乌拉圭报仇雪耻的机会终于来到了.

sentences.en: She had decided to avenge herself and all the other women he had abused.
sentences.cn: 她决定为自己和所有其他被他侮辱的女性报仇。

sentences.en: They swore to avenge their lord's death.
sentences.cn: 他们发誓为他们领主之死报仇.

sentences.en: They were burning to avenge the death of their leader.
sentences.cn: 他们极为激动要为他们首领之死报仇.

sentences.en: Was he attempting to prepare a wholesale massacre to avenge his son?
sentences.cn: 莫非他企图把大伙都一网打尽来给他儿子报仇?

trans.tran_en: to do something to hurt or punish someone because they have harmed or offended you

trans.tran_cn: 报仇， 复仇， 向报仇
